comments:
Using WTP 3.0 M2 I20070920

1. create an xsd file with the following
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/myschema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/myschema" elementFormDefault="qualified">

    <complexType name="NewXSDComplexType">
    	<sequence>
    		<element ref="tns:NewElement"></element>
    	</sequence>
    </complexType>
    
    <element name="NewElement" type="string"></element>
</schema>

2. Navigate into NewXSDComplexType in design view
3. Click on NewElement element ref
4. In the properties view, click on the rename refactoring light bulb
5. You get an "Unhandled event loop exception" written to the log with the following:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.refactor.actions.RenameComponentAction.run(RenameComponentAction.java:105)
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.refactor.actions.SelectionDispatchAction.run(SelectionDispatchAction.java:103)
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.refactor.actions.SelectionDispatchAction.dispatchRun(SelectionDispatchAction.java:170)
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.refactor.actions.SelectionDispatchAction.run(SelectionDispatchAction.java:147)
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.common.properties.sections.RefactoringSection.invokeRenameRefactoring(RefactoringSection.java:47)
at org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.common.properties.sections.RefactoringSection.linkActivated(RefactoringSection.java:73)
at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.AbstractHyperlink.handleActivate(AbstractHyperlink.java:228)
at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.ImageHyperlink.handleActivate(ImageHyperlink.java:177)
at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.AbstractHyperlink.handleMouseUp(AbstractHyperlink.java:316)
at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.AbstractHyperlink.access$2(AbstractHyperlink.java:300)
Refactoring of element refs are not allowed.

The refactoring light bulb and the name field will be disabled for element refs.

Fix checked in for WTP 3.0 M2.

See https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=204493.

Refactoring of external references is currently not supported.
